title: Glitches in latest Thunderbird SuperNova
content:
The newest version of Thunderbird (SuperNova 115.3.3 32-bit) has several glitches:

1. The print menu only selects for "Save to PDF"; all of the other installed printers are not available. For awhile, restarting my PC restored the printer list, but "Save PDF" remained the default. Now, only the "Save to PDF" is available as a printer. This happens in both Windows 10 and Windows 11. (All of the available installed printers appear in the print menus of Firefox, Microsoft Office programs, and Adobe Acrobat.)

2. When opening Thunderbird, several tabs automatically appear above the list of messages that say "Thunderbird privacy notice." These can deleted manually, but they reappear each time Thunderbird is opened.

3. Messages marked as Junk email are not automatically moved to the Junk folder, despite our settings to do this by default. When we manually try to collectively move the marked messages to the Junk folder, we get a message that Thunderbird is unable to write to the folder and that we need to compact our folders. We have done so several times and the problem and message still persists. We can click on the Junk icon for each marked message and transfer each to the Junk folder individually, but this often results in finding duplicate messages in the Junk folder. Fortunately, we routinely empty the folder; the problem persists, however, the next time we "Get Messages." Individually moving Junk messages is tedious and runs counter to the intent of our program settings.

Thunderbird has been a superb email client that we have used for years using the POP3 protocol. We rely on the program to manage our emails into folders and to save the results annually. The above glitches appeared over the last 10 days while we were routinely using this client as always. Of the above, the printer menu problem is the most serious, possible fatal, turning SuperNova into more like a Black Hole. Please help! -- wayne
creator: wbell2

content: I just want to turn my preview pane on and have to ask 4 times in various places??? Why is finding what should be such a simple answer, so hard

title: Hide Windows Title Bar, place Tab bar on top, and get Windows minimize/maximize/close buttons on Tab bar
content:
Thunderbird option to upgrade automatically was reset some time ago (I never allow this) so I ended up with v115. First I wanted the tab bar on top, above the unified toolbar. So I created a "userChrome.css" that looks like...

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - @import url("chrome://messenger/content/unifiedtoolbar/unifiedToolbarWebextensions.css"); @namespace html url("http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml");

/* Set up the toolbars so the menu bar is on top and the tabs bar is second */ /* all above the new unified toolbar. */

  1. toolbar-menubar { 
 order: -1;

}

  1. tabs-toolbar { 
 order: -1;

}

/* row height of thread pane - I set 20px - please note that you may not need this */ /*Thunderbird now offers View > Density > 'Compact', 'Default', 'Relaxed' options */

  1. threadTree > table[is="tree-view-table"] td { 
 line-height: 20px !important;

} - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

The last section is to modify the message list line height because it looked too cramped and changing fonts does for everything, which isn't what I wanted here.

So, I now have to get rid of the Windows Title bar. In Settings > Window Layout there is a checkbox to allow me to "Hide system window titlebar". I do this and voila` it doesn't work as expected because the minimize/maximize/close buttons drop down to the Unified toolbar instead of the tabs bar that I moved to the top (where in my opinion it should be).

How would I get this Windows controls off the Unified toolbar and onto the tabs bar?

title: Outgoing Server Settings Timing Out ~ Can receive but can't send emails
content: Hello: I have just set up a new desktop PC. Have downloaded/installed Thunderbird email program (used previously with old PC). Entered manual configuration using Spectrum server settings, user name (email) for Incoming Server and Outgoing Server. Had to attempt to process manually several times, and then suddenly everything popped up....all my previous emails were there, although my address book was gone. EVERYTHING worked yesterday (10/18) from that point through shut down later in the evening. Suddenly today, I start rebuilding my address book, and was trying to send message. Processing message and "sending" was taking very long, and finally error message pops up saying "Message can't be sent due to Outgoing Server timing out." Incoming Server and receiving messages appears to be fine...no issues there...successfully receiving emails. I've gone back and checked my settings on Outgoing Server...they are same as I entered yesterday.... Although the port listed 587 has a "default" port number listed to the right as "465" ..... the number of the port and the default (993) on the Incoming Server match. Is this the problem? There's no way to change/edit the 465. Is this a systemic issue? I see several other posters with problems with Outgoing Server/stmp issues. Judy Gamble

title: Při přepínání složek se mění rozmezí zobrazených zpráv
content:
U nové verze Thunderbirdu (teď 115.3.3 32 bitů) mi při přepínání mezi složkami nezobrazuje nejnovější zprávy, ale náhodně starší zprávy. Přitom mám na složkách zapnuto seřazení podle Datum vzestupně.

Např. přepnu na složku "Doručená pošta" a sjedu dolů na nejnovější zprávy, vyberu nejnovější. Pak přepnu na složku "Reklama", sjedu dolů na nejnovější zprávy a vyberu nejnovější. Při přepnutí na "Doručená pošta" a zpět na "Reklama" se mi zobrazují v okně zprávy kolem 11. měsíce 2018. Přepnu zpět na "Doručená pošta" a vidím zprávy 3. měsíce 2023. Přepnu na "Reklama" a vidím zprávy 9. měsíce 2019. A tak dál to postupně skáče jakoby se to posouvalo po nějakém časovém úseku.

Také když zadám po spuštění Thunderbirdu "Přijmout zprávy", musím ve všech složkách najet dolů na nejnovější. Zkoušel jsem zrušit a znovu vytvořit indexový soubor global-messages-db.sqlite jak tu bylo v někde uvedeno, ale nepomohlo to. Dělá mi to na obou počítačích, kde došlo na aktualizaci nové verze.

content:

Thank you.

title: Passaggio da TB 3.1.8 (o 17.0.8) a ultima versione 115: non tiene più in memoria la psw dell'account
content: Salve, provando a leggere l'articolo nel forum in cui si parla di migrare la posta da outlook a thunderbird, dice di installare una vecchia versione che è la 3.1.8, ma anche in altri articoli ho trovato 17.0.8. Ok, tutto perfetto, importo la posta e la rubrica da outlook, ma poi, quando vado a vedere di passare all'ultima versione, non mi propone alcun aggiornamento. A quel punto passo a mano l'eseguibile dell'ultima versione e, appena si apre thunderbird aggiornato mi richiede la password dell'account di posta e lo fa PER TUTTE le volte che scarico i messaggi o invio messaggi. Se vado a vedere nella sezione privacy - password, la finestra è vuota. In modalità risoluzione problemi, invece, funziona e la salva regolarmente nelle password, però vorrei precisare che non ho estensioni nè temi installati perché appena installato..... Se invece io installo direttamente l'ultima versione di thunderbird questo problema non si presenta, però non mi permette di importare la posta da outlook. Ho letto una vagonata di articoli tra qui e online, ma direttamente con l'ultima versione non riesco in nessun modo ad importare la posta. Come posso fare per avere botte piena e moglie ubriaca? Grazie.

title: Can't send email Updated to Version 115.3.3 (64-bit)
content:
Hi everyone


A few days ago, my emails would not send.

I recently updated to Version 115.3.3.

Mac OSX 10.13.6


On sending emails I get the following ERROR MESSAGE

Login to server mail.XXXXXXXXX.co.uk with username xxxxxx@XXXXXXXXXXXXXX.co.uk failed.

Emails are still received, so I am logged into account.

On re-entering password a few times, I then get following


ERROR MESSAGE Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) mail.lockboxstorage.co.uk timed out. Try again.

I have checked Server & Outgoing settings and all are well.

Server Settings Server Name: mail.XXXXXXXXX.co.uk Port: 993 Username xxxxxx@XXXXXXXXXXXXXX.co.uk Connection Security: SSL/TLS Authentic Method: Normal Password

Outgoing Settings Description: Not Specified Server Name: mail.XXXXXXXXX.co.uk Port: 465 Username xxxxxx@XXXXXXXXXXXXXX.co.uk Connection Security: SSL/TLS Authentic Method: Normal Password

Have deleted account from TB Have deleted stored passwords from TB Re-added email account - Account reloads and new emails are received

Have changed security.tls.version.min via Cofig-Editor to 1 - emails still not sending

Any other suggestions? Is it something to do with folder locations, cache, profile? None of these have been changed since TB was working with perfectly?

title: Cancellazione posta inviata
content: In tutte le caselle di posta IMAP è stata improvvisamente cancellata la posta inviata ad eccezione di pochi messaggi. In particolare nella mia casella che uso per il lavoro dal 2015 e nella quale erano presenti tutti i messaggi inviati, sono spariti la maggior parte dei messaggi ad eccezione di alcuni del 2025 e circa 20 messaggi del 2023. Ho contttato Aruba coem fornitore del servizio lato server, ma mi rimandano a problemi residenti in Thunderbird. Sono stati persi messaggi inviati anche nella casella PEC, messaggi molto importanti con valore legale... Uso Thunderbird da 10 anni e mai era successa una cosa simile, ho controllato le impostatzioni della cartella "posta inviata" e confermo che è attiva la spunta "non eliminare alcunmessaggio". Inoltre nella cartella posta inviata sono presenti messaggi della posta ricevuta... Attendo riscontro e saluto cordialmente Davide D'Angelo
creator: info10116

title: Emails
content: I have had a Thunderbirds Email client for over 8 years. It has worked brilliantly. I had an easy set up. I had one Inbox into which all emails arrived and one sent folder into which copies of all emails that I sent were placed. For some reason, and I do not know how I managed to fat finger this, the sent folder has split itself in eight separate yearly folders and placed all the emails into those 8 archive folders. This, I do not want. How can I revert to my usual set up of having all emails in one Inbox and 1 Sent email folder? I suppose it will need to have the contents of the yearly archive folders get back into the respective sent folder and inbox. Nothing complicated by way of guidance.............. an idiots guide is all that I can manage Look to hear from you with a solution asap
creator: nicastro6

title: No se muestran los emails recibidos en MAC
content:

Si no abro manualmente cada bandeja, no se si tengo emails en la misma.

title: Getting Back To eMail List After Reading one ?  Best Way ?
content:
Hello,

Can't seem to figure out how to do this.

I click on the upper left icon, and all my eMails appear. Great.

I then click on one to read it. No problem (anymore, after a re-install)

After reading it, I would like to automatically go back to the full list of emails. Instead, the only way I can get there, is to click the icon right below; the one that opens up the Address book.

Then, I can re-click the uppermost, and the list appears.

What is the right way of doing this, please ?

Bob
creator: rgsrose2

title: Submitting an issue: "Microsoft Outlook Test Message" on setting up existing mail account
content:
Hi community,

I think it's a bug in Thunderbird, currently on version 115.3.3:

When setting up a mail account, with the option "Existing Mail Account", on successful connection it has sent a test mail similar to those Microsoft Outlook would use, with subject "Microsoft Outlook Test Message". Seeing as I also have Microsoft Outlook on my computer, it confused me.

Where can I submit a ticket?

title: Search not including results in the junk folder
content:
I have emails in the junk folder which when running the top level 'ctrl + k' search function is only geting emails from the inbox folders and is missing the emails in the junk folder. To get them i have to go into the junk folder, click on quick filter and search there, where they then show up.

How do i enable the search function to use all folders, inboxes, sent and junk.

title: 17.10.2023 versiopäivityksen jälkeen viestiä ei onnistu lähettää, eikä saa niitä
content:
Toissapäivän versiopäivityksen jälkeen viestien lähettäminen ei onnistu. SMTP asennukset ovat ok, Windowsin palomuurin lisätty Thunderbird, myös Windows supportin kanssa keskusteltu. Kone ja Thunderbird käynnistettiin monta kerta uudelleen. Virheilmoitus on: 'Viestin lähettäminen epäonnistui. Viestiä ei voitu lähettää, koska yhteys SMTP-palvelimeen smtp.office365.com aikakatkaistiin. Yritä uudelleen tai ota yhteyttä verkon ylläpitoon.'

Viestien saamisellakin on ongelma. Joskus tulee viestiä, mutta saan ne myöhemmin. Tänään ei tullut ollenkaan viestejä Thunderbirdin kautta, vaikka olen saanut monta viestejä.

Thunderbird asetettu uudelleen. Eikä se ole auttanut... :(
creator: xszxcsx

title: JustReportIt or Just Report It - add-on Question
content:
Right then,

I use TB as my client for my personal Gmail, Hotmail and my business email. Gmail and Hotmail have Spam reporting abilities. My business email does not. After reading reviews and researching, Just Report It seems to be a good solution. However....

I downloaded the programme and installed it. I opened a spam email and clicked on the JustReportIt button. A new email opens with the original as an attachment. Problem is the 'To' line is blank. I understand these emails are to be sent to the Registrar of the domain cited in the spam mail, but how do I obtain the Registrar's email?

Thanks in advance.

title: Change Font color and background color of the buttons that now (115.3.1) populate the Left pane
content:
Hi All, This 115 update looks like it has Chicken Pox with all the circles and boxes that now appear on the left pane to give counts.

I want to change the background of these circles and rectangles to white and the Font color to black.

How do I do that, please.

Oh By the Way (not the topic of this post): 1. when I select an account in left pane and click Read Messages on right, the only action that occurs is it switches to inbox. Does NOT read messages. Fortunately if I Right Click on account I can choose Get Messages and read mail that way. 2. Two of my family are in a panic because they cannot Send mail at all, since the update. 3. For me TB crashes sometimes. That has NEVER happened in past. 4. If any Developers are reading this ... I have read other posts about changing other Font specs etc and it requires creating new css file and writing css code, etc. While I can do all that myself the average TB user cannot. They will be intimidated by it. It is quite unfriendly. How about just put ALL settings in the about:config area?

Thanks !!
creator: rp108

title: Want Thunderbird sync
content:
We appreciate and enjoy the settings continuity within Mozilla Firefox, allowing us to operate across multiple devices with same passwords etc.

Why can't we get that same functionality with THUNDERBIRD? Traveling away from the office with Thunderbird on my tablet I lose access to emails stored in folders in my main PC. I have tried the migrating process before and after trips abroad but it never collects ALL my emails. Most recently, the migrating method picked up setting, folders and emails up to 2021 - but nothing more recent. Consequently, I had to travel without a proper record.

The 'migration' process is clumsy and unreliable.

Why can't we open a THUNDERBIRD account on any device and find all our work, settings and history as we do with Mozilla Firefox?
creator: Robimars

title: Used my settings from my webmail and still won't work in Thunderbird
content:
Hey folks.

I have used Thunderbird for my Gmail acounts with no issues.

Decided to move all my work accounts into Thunderbird as I was using Mailbird for them and occasionally emails email seem to hang up and get stuck, too many for me to want to stay.

I entered all the settings from my cPanel settings but it simply won't work for either of my work emails.

They work just fine on Mailbird except the issue mentioned and I checked the server settings there and every thing matches.

Just won't work on Thunderbird.

Any ideas?
